titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Mathematics Department records, 1990-2004 RG0074
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-11 11:52:22 -0500.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Washington University. Dept. of Mathematics

did.abstract: Materials for this collection include the National mathematics awareness week celebrations at GWU (1990), schedules, brochures, flyers, articles, trustees' roll, questionnaire results, correspondence, and press releases. They concern colloquia, seminars, the Mathematics Department, faculty information, areas of study, graduate programs, courses, and lectures. They range in date from 1990-2004.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: Mathematics Department records, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquisition data for this collection is unknown.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical or Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Mathematics Department is a part of the Columbian College of Arts and Sciences.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials for this collection include the National mathematics awareness week celebrations at GWU (1990), schedules, brochures, flyers, articles, trustees' roll, questionnaire results, correspondence, and press releases. They concern colloquia, seminars, the Mathematics Department, faculty information, areas of study, graduate programs, courses, and lectures. They range in date from 1990-2004.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: Organized in two series: Departmental files and Mathematics Awareness Week.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains schedules, brochures, flyers, articles, trustees' roll, questionnaire results, correspondence, and press releases. They range in date from 1909 to 2004. They concern colloquia, seminars, the Mathematics Department, faculty information, areas of study, graduate programs, courses, and lectures.

did.unittitle: Mathematics, Department of Colloquia and Seminars

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains files related to the subject of National Mathematics Awareness Week celebrations at GW, April 7 and 21, 1990.
This series is unprocessed, please ask staff for assistance.
